title: LTB or LTT for T206 Speaker Polar Bear
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: LTB or LTT for T206 Speaker Polar Bear
posts.post_content: If anyone has a Tris Speaker T206 with a Polar back in 4 that you would consider selling or trading please let me know. I have some good stuff to trade or can buy it outright. PSA preferred. Thanks.
